name: I am in a Cosmic Karma

metadata.name: I am in a Cosmic Karma
metadata.description:
…//  
Oh, fateful karma, thou art a force to be reckoned with,  
Guiding our lives with an unseen hand,  
Leading us down paths both dark and bright,  
Teaching us lessons both bitter and sweet.

For every action we take,  
Thou doth deliver a consequence in kind,  
So let us be mindful of our choices,  
Lest we reap what we have sown.

For karma is a wheel that doth turn,  
A circle that doth bind us all,

For in the end, it is our actions that do speak louder,  
Than any words we may utter or pen,  
So let us be mindful of our deeds,  
As we journey through this mortal coil.  
…//
